1.title: Holmes to Hollywood
1.plot: Robert Schlabach and Albert Miller from 'Vanilla Ice Goes Amish' are fish-out-of-water when they travel to Los Angeles for a kitchen renovation project to raise money for their hometown in Holmes County, Ohio.

2.title: Sin City Amish
2.plot: Albert and Leon arrive in Las Vegas to convert a professional BMX biker's dated living room into a dark modern man cave. When they're not building a new wet bar, barn doors and refacing the fireplace, the boys explore Vegas.

3.title: Desert Kitchen Revival
3.plot: Albert Miller and Leon Schlabach travel to the desert oasis of Palm Springs to build a mid-century modern kitchen and living room with an Amish twist.

4.title: Beantown Basement
4.plot: Albert and Leon head to Boston to tackle a basement renovation taking it from the dated 70s to a trendy hangout for tweens. They create a vintage inspired snack bar and family room that the kids can call their own.

5.title: Attic Overhaul
5.plot: Albert and Leon are in Newport, Rhode Island, to create usable space in a growing family's unfinished attic. The transformation includes a kids' playroom with a nautical theme plus a cozy home office area.

6.title: A Big Job in the Big Easy
6.plot: Albert and Leon head down south to renovate a historic double-shotgun New Orleans home.

7.title: Backyard Ranch Oasis
7.plot: Albert and Leon visit a ranch in Texas and turn a rundown patio into a dream backyard.

8.title: A Bathroom Oasis by the Big Apple
8.plot: Albert and Leon head to the New York metropolitan area for a major bathroom renovation. In between builds they ditch the mustang for the subway, explore Times Square and try Indian food for the first time.

9.title: A Fix Fit for Christmas
9.plot: Albert and Leon go to Staten Island, NY to redo a dining and living room in time for Christmas.

imdb.plot outline: Master craftsmen from Vanilla Ice Goes Amish are fish out of water when they travel across the country to work on home improvement projects. From the big city of Chicago to the bright lights of Las Vegas and the beaches of Southern California, it's a brave new world tackling modern tasks like managing social media and driving a car. Find out what happens to them when they leave Amish country and take their talents on the road.
imdb.title: Amish RENOgades
plot: Master craftsmen from Vanilla Ice Goes Amish are fish out of water when they travel across the country to work on home improvement projects. From the big city of Chicago to the bright lights of Las Vegas and the beaches of Southern California, it's a brave new world tackling modern tasks like managing social media and driving a car.
